name: V'anhalla
tagline: Simple & Easy vegan skincare with v'anhalla
description: V'anhalla started with the question 'As much as number of basic care, did skin get better?' We're boldly reducing complex and overlapping basic care routine and enhancing essential ingredients for each skin concern. Hope to permeate your daily life with basic cosmetics that bring true rest and vitality in a busy daily life.

technologies.name: Ceramide Complex
technologies.description: Ceramide NP with panthenol and 3 complex hyaluronic acid for deep moisturizing and skin barrier strengthening

technologies.name: Cica Calm Technology
technologies.description: Centella asiatica extract for rapid calming and refreshing hydration

technologies.name: Tranexamic Acid Formula
technologies.description: 3% Tranexamic acid for effective blemish and dark spot care
